entities.name: SAP Fiori 2.0 App
entities.description: In this tutorial, we showcase how to structure your UI5 app using the layout patterns that comply with the latest SAP Fiori guidelines.
samplesAsSteps: Creating an Empty Flexible Column Layout
Using Dynamic Page for the Master View
Using Object Page Layout as a Detail Page
Using the Flexible Column Layout Semantic Helper

samples.name: Dynamic Page Freestyle Example
samples.description: Dynamic Page freestyle example with a responsive sap.m.Table in the content area, showing that each control can be placed in the title and the header content areas.

samples.name: Dynamic Page with Analytical Table
samples.description: Dynamic Page containing an Analytical Table in the content area and filters in the header aligned with the SAP Fiori 2 List Report floorplan.

samples.name: Dynamic Page with Sticky Subheader
samples.description: Dynamic Page containing an sap.m.IconTabBar in the sticky subheader content area.

samples.name: Dynamic Page with Wizard
samples.description: Dynamic Page containing a sap.m.Wizard and WizardProgressNavigator in the content area.

samples.name: Flexible Column Layout with Routing and One Initial Column
samples.description: Flexible Column Layout as an app with routing that starts with a single initial column.

samples.name: Flexible Column Layout with Routing and first page in fullscreen only
samples.description: Flexible Column Layout as an app with routing that displays different pages in the initial column. The first page is only displayed in OneColumn layout type

samples.name: Flexible Column Layout with Routing and Two Initial Columns
samples.description: Flexible Column Layout as an app with routing that starts with two initial columns.

samples.name: Flexible Column Layout (with Event Bus)
samples.description: Clicking on a link in a column opens the next column.

samples.name: Avatar
samples.description: This sample demonstrates different combinations of types, shapes, and sizes of the Avatar.

samples.name: Avatar Group (Experimental)
samples.description: This sample demonstrates the different group types and item sizes of the AvatarGroup control.

samples.name: Semantic Page using Draft Indicator
samples.description: This sample demonstrates the use of a DraftIndicator in the footer area.

samples.name: Semantic Page - Freestyle Sample
samples.description: This sample demonstrates a SemanticPage with all semantic-specific actions both in the title and in the footer areas.

samples.name: Grid List - Different Modes With Various Item Types
samples.description: This is a sample for GridList with different modes of selection.

samples.name: Grid List - Break point examples - S, M, L, XL
samples.description: This sample illustrates how to configure the responsive settings for different container sizes.

samples.name: Grid List with GridBoxLayout
samples.description: This layout allows to display same height grid items with configurable width.

samples.name: Grid List features - Grouping, Header, Growing
samples.description: This sample illustrates subgroups with headers, custom header and lazy loading of GridList items.

samples.name: Grid List - Item Designs
samples.description: This is a sample for GridList item templates representing a typical tools page dashboard style.

samples.name: Grid List - Drag and Drop
samples.description: This sample represents GridList with enabled Drag and Drop functionality.

samples.name: GridList with Responsive Column Layout
samples.description: This layout displays a variable number of grid columns depending on available screen size. Grid row's height is dynamically determined by the height of the highest grid element on this row.

samples.name: Shell Bar with title mega menu
samples.description: Shell Bar example showing the control title as part of a mega menu, configurable by the app developer.

samples.name: Shell Bar with menu button
samples.description: Shell Bar example with a menu button and a plain title.

samples.name: Shell Bar with Product Switch (Experimental)
samples.description: Shell Bar example with enabled Product Switch, configurable by the app developer. The Product Switch control is in experimental state.

samples.name: Shell Bar with search
samples.description: Shell Bar example with configured search functionality.

samples.name: Shell Bar with Flexible Column Layout
samples.description: Example of Shell Bar in combination with Flexible Column Layout.

samples.name: Shell Bar with Split App
samples.description: Example of Shell Bar in combination with Split App.

samples.name: Card Control
samples.description: This sample illustrates how to specify the predefined header and the content of the Card control.

samples.name: Grid Container
samples.description: This sample represents the general usage of GridContainer.

samples.name: Grid Container - Drag and Drop
samples.description: This sample represents GridContainer with enabled Drag and Drop functionality.

samples.name: Grid Container - Drag and Drop From List to GridContainer
samples.description: This sample represents how items from a control which is not GridContainer can be dragged and dropped over a GridContainer.
